title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 70.2 - How appeal to be commenced; time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 70.2 - How appeal to be commenced; time

State Regulations

An appeal from a wage order or a regulation shall be made
by filing an original and three conformed copies of a petition with the board
at its Albany office. The petition must be filed within 45 days after the date
of the publication of the notice of the challenged order or regulation. The
petition need not be verified. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
